title: All hail the power of Jesus' name

verses.text: All hail the power of Jesus' name, Let angels prostrate fall; Bring forth the royal diadem, To crown him Lord of all.
Let high-born seraphs tune the lyre, And, as they tune it, fall Before his face who tunes their choir, And crown him Lord of all.
Crown him, ye morning stars of light, He fixed this floating ball; Now hail the strength of Israel's might, And crown him Lord of all.
Crown him, ye martyrs of your God, Who from his altar call;
